d1_flags: 1. goto C9DD78 if TEMP_2 is set
1. goto C9DD87 if TENDAS_NOT_SHY is set
d1_text:
Npc1261:
[GOTO_IF_FLAG TENDAS_NOT_SHY L_C9DD87]
[GOTO_IF_FLAG TEMP_2 L_C9DD78]
ï¿½There's only one Tenda who's not shy.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½It's me, bubby![WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½You know what?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½There's something scary that comes from the underground.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½So, we covered up the hole.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½There are lots of dinosaurs there.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I went there once, but I came right back, 'cause I was so surprised![WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½There was a talking stone that talks a lot.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Do you wanna go and see?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I understand.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½But I'm not as strong as I look.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I'm sorry, I guess I can't help you.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½The guy next to me is strong, but he lacks conversation skills.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½He needs to overcome his shyness first.[HALT][SET_FLAG TEMP_2]
[END]

d2_text:
L_C9D6F8:
[GET_INV_ITEM REG_RESULT 0][SWAP_ARG_RESULT]
[CHECK_EQUAL 211][GOTO_IF_TRUE L_C9D70B]
[GOTO L_C7C6B6]
; $C9D70B
L_C9D70B:
ï¿½The Tenda turned it down, but really seemed tempted...[HALT][END]
